title: Mac苹果版: AE插件-光线折射模糊朦胧效果 Diopter V1.02 版
author: 大众脸
content: 该插件可在AE中快速为视频或图像添加模糊、失真、调色等效果，还能用自定义形状和其他图层生成光效。
supported_versions: After Effects CC 2019, CC 2018, CC 2017, CC 2015.3, CC 2015, CC 2014, CC, CS6

download_links.name: AE插件：光线折射模糊朦胧效果 Aescripts Diopter V1.02 Mac - 城通网盘下载
AE插件：光线折射模糊朦胧效果 Aescripts Diopter V1.02 Mac - 百度网盘下载
AE插件：光线折射模糊朦胧效果 Aescripts Diopter V1.02 Win

other.plugin_english_introduction: Diopter is a plugin which adds optical effects (blur, distortion, coloration) on a layer. Choose a lens shape (a mask) among the in-built shapes or use another layer as Luma Matte. This lens may be transformed.
